name: Mills - Classic Cash Payday
description: Hi Champ! Are you ready to defeat your opponent’s by playing with your friends and family using real cash. Mills is a strategic board game in which you build a row, you can remove one of the opponent pieces. Challenge your friends and try to beat one of your well-trained virtual players. Players compete to stay on the game board by swapping black and white pieces on the board to make a match and challenge each other using real cash.
